name.description: Unique identifying name for the type of audit event

description.description: A human-readable description of how this event is triggered

introduced_by_issue.description: URL to GitLab issue that added this type of audit event

introduced_by_mr.description: URL to GitLab merge request that added this type of audit event

feature_category.description: The feature category of this audit event. For example, compliance_management

milestone.description: Milestone that introduced this audit event type. For example, 15.8

saved_to_database.description: Indicate whether to persist events to database and JSON logs

streamed.description: Indicate that events should be streamed to external services (if configured)

scope.description: Scope that the audit event belongs to
